title: Clubs and fests doubt?
content: Can ec campus people join rr clubs and vice versa? will u need to bunk classes in order to attend club activities in other campus? Also does Maaya and Atmatrisha happen at the same time?

comments.body:
Not all clubs allow people to join from the other campus. Afaik most club events and activities aren't allowed during class hours. Some do take place but they aren't too common. (Not 100% sure)


Maaya and aathmatrisha take place around 6 months apart. I forget the months.
Maaya is odd sem, Aatmatrisha even sem

Adding on, I don't think any *big* club in RR atleast allow EC campus people to join, because almost all events happen offline here and it will be hard to travel from there to here for just club events
Yup that's true. At most some coding/ CS related clubs might allow.
As far as I know no. You can't switch campuses for clubs. Mostly they'll be held after class hours and if its during you have to take permission to leave class.
